Hero.description: I build modern, accessible, and scalable web applications using React, TypeScript, and Next.js.

About.title: About Me
About.paragraph1: I am a frontend developer with a strong focus on clean, accessible, and user-centered web interfaces. I enjoy translating complex requirements into clear and maintainable UI solutions.
About.paragraph2: I have worked in both agency and modern frontend environments, collaborating closely with designers and developers to deliver responsive and scalable web applications.
